description: AI-powered development platform for Kubernetes deployments and intelligent automation

environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic API key for Claude AI integration (required for deployments)

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for embeddings (patterns, policies, capabilities)

environmentVariables.name: QDRANT_URL
environmentVariables.description: Qdrant Vector DB URL for patterns, policies, and capabilities storage

environmentVariables.name: KUBECONFIG
environmentVariables.description: Path to kubeconfig file for Kubernetes access

environmentVariables.name: DOT_AI_SESSION_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Session storage directory for workflow persistence
